ingredients.ingredient: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons za'atar, divided, or more to taste

cookingTips: Pat chicken skin dry before roasting for crispier skin
Roast at 425°F for 30-35 minutes until skin is golden and internal temperature reaches 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Za'atar gives chicken wonderful flavor and color. Do you prefer your chicken roasted or pan-seared?
